        <api_name>global.FSMBellNotifcationUtil</api_name>

        <description/>
        <name>FSMBellNotifcationUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FSMBellNotifcationUtil = Class.create();
FSMBellNotifcationUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    sendBellNotification: function(targetTable, targetId, recipients, payload) {
        var triggeredById = gs.getUserID();
        var route = "cb1af195872023002941b53046cb0b4e";
        var trigger = "7cf16bd4c3930110a0cd587c1f40ddcb"
        recipients.forEach(function(recipientId) {
            var bellNotificationGR = new GlideRecord("ui_notification_inbox");
            bellNotificationGR.setValue("payload", JSON.stringify(payload));
            bellNotificationGR.setValue("recipient", recipientId);
            bellNotificationGR.setValue("target", targetId);
            bellNotificationGR.setValue("target_table", targetTable);
            bellNotificationGR.setValue("triggered_by", triggeredById);
            bellNotificationGR.setValue("route", route);
            bellNotificationGR.setValue("status", "new");
            bellNotificationGR.insert();
        });
    },
	createRecipientList: function(record, userFlds, groupFlds, scriptedUsers){
		var recipients = [];
        if (!gs.nil(userFlds)) {
            userFlds.split(",").forEach(function(f) {
				var u = record.getValue(f);
                if (!recipients.includes(u)) {
                    recipients.push(u);
                }
            })
        }
        if (!gs.nil(groupFlds)) {
			var groupIds = [];
			groupFlds.split(",").forEach(function(g){
				groupIds.push(record.getValue(g))
			});
			var memberGr = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
			memberGr.addEncodedQuery("groupIN"+groupIds.join(",") )
            memberGr.query();
			while(memberGr.next()){
				var user = memberGr.getValue("user");
				if (!recipients.includes(user)) {
                    recipients.push(user);
                }
			}
        }
		if(!gs.nil(scriptedUsers)){
			scriptedUsers.forEach(function(u){
				if (!recipients.includes(u)) {
                    recipients.push(u);
                }
			})
		}
		return recipients;
	},
	sendNotificationWithPayload: function(taskRecord, userFlds, groupFlds, scriptedUsers,  payload) {
		var recipients = this.createRecipientList(taskRecord, userFlds, groupFlds, scriptedUsers);
		var targetTable = taskRecord.getTableName();
		var targetId = taskRecord.sys_id;
		this.sendBellNotification(targetTable, targetId, recipients, payload);
	},
	

    type: 'FSMBellNotifcationUtil'
};]]></script>
